body: Tolleston Dunes        Dennis Gray, NPS Collection       Facilities Open Daily: 7:00 a.m. - 30 minutes past sunset  Parking for cars Porta-potty Information board listing current park activities  Street Address / Road Intersection Hillcrest Road & Dunes Highway Portage, IN 46368 GPS Coordinates 041.36.57N 087.11.34W       Trails Tolleston Dunes Trail Map         Click image for the full trail map.        Visitor Activities  Year-round hiking trail Cross-country ski when snow permits Walk to the accessible overlook that has interpretive wayside exhibits
title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Tolleston Dunes
